summary: "Alien" is a 1979 sci-fi horror movie directed by Ridley Scott. It's about a spaceship crew that finds a creepy spaceship and gets hunted by a deadly alien. The film stars Sigourney Weaver and was based on a story by Dan O'Bannon and Ronald Shusett. At first, critics were mixed, but it won an Academy Award and is now considered one of the best sci-fi horror films. It made a lot of money and led to many sequels, prequels, and other media. Weaver's career took off because of her role.
title: Alien (film)
